languages.text: "Ты знаком{mf||а} с Кунрадом Войгтвиром? Не знаю, жив ли он сейчас, но тогда он был Мастером шепотов при Теодоре. По идее, именно он должен был вычислить моих шпионов. Но в итоге именно он сильнее всех уверовал, что они — его шанс провернуть блестящую интригу и доказать мамочке, каким хорошим наследником он будет. Правду говорят, что среди светловолосых придурки все через одного".

"Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should have been the one to out my operatives as spies. But instead, he thought that they were his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mummy how great an heir he would become. It's true what they say about blonds — every other one is as thick as mince."
languages.original_text: "Ты знаком{mf||а} с Кунрадом Войгтвиром? Не знаю, жив ли он сейчас, но тогда он был Мастером шепотов при Теодоре. По идее, именно он должен был вычислить моих шпионов. Но в итоге именно он сильнее всех уверовал, что они — его шанс провернуть блестящую интригу и доказать мамочке, каким хорошим наследником он будет. Правду говорят, что среди светловолосых придурки все через одного".

traits.locale_text: "Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should've been the one to out me as a spy. But instead I ended up persuading him that I was his chance to pull off a brilliant intrigue and prove to his mommy how great a heir he was going to be. It is true when they say that every second fair-head is an idiot."

"Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should've been the one to out me as a spy. But instead I ended up persuading him that I was his chance to pull off a brilliant intrigue and prove to his mommy how great a heir he was going to be. It is true when they say that every second fair-head is an idiot."

But instead, I ended up persuading him that I was his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mommy how great an heir he was going to be. It's true when they say that every other fair-head is a twat."

"Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should've been the one to out me as a spy. But instead, I ended up persuading him that I was his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mommy how great an heir he was going to be. It's true when they say that every other fair-head is a twat."

"Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should have been the one to out my operatives as spies. But instead, he thought that they were his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mummy how great an heir he would become. It's true what they say about blonds — every other one is as thick as mince."

"Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should have been the one to out my operatives as spies. But instead, he thought that they were his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mummy how great an heir he would become. It's true what they say about blonds — every other one is as thick as mince."

languages.text: « Vous connaissez Kunrad Voigtvir ? Je ne sais pas s'il est encore en vie, mais à l'époque, il était le maître des murmures de Théodora. En théorie, c'est lui qui aurait dû s'apercevoir que certains des miens étaient des espions, mais au lieu de ça, il a pensé qu'ils lui offraient une chance de réussir un ingénieux stratagème pour prouver à sa maman qu'il ferait un héritier exceptionnel. C'est vrai ce qu'on dit : la moitié des têtes blondes sont des demeurés. »
languages.original_text: "Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should have been the one to out my operatives as spies. But instead, he thought that they were his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mummy how great an heir he would become. It's true what they say about blonds — every other one is as thick as mince."

traits.locale_text: « Vous connaissez Kunrad Voigtvir ? Je ne sais pas s'il est encore en vie, mais à l'époque, il était le maître des murmures de Théodora. En théorie, c'est lui qui aurait dû s'apercevoir que j'étais une espionne, mais au lieu de ça, j'ai pu le persuader que je lui offrais une chance de réussir un ingénieux stratagème pour prouver à sa maman qu'il ferait un héritier exceptionnel. C'est vrai ce qu'on dit : la moitié des têtes blondes sont des demeurés. »

languages.text: «¿Conoce a Kunrad Voigtvir? No sé ni si seguirá vivo, pero en su época era el maestro de susurros de Theodora. En un principio, le correspondía destapar que mis agentes eran espías, pero acabó decidiendo que era el momento de organizar un complot brillante y demostrarle a su mamaíta que iba a ser un heredero estupendo. Es cierto lo que dicen de los rubios. Ni una neurona entre todos».
languages.original_text: "Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should have been the one to out my operatives as spies. But instead, he thought that they were his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mummy how great an heir he would become. It's true what they say about blonds — every other one is as thick as mince."

traits.locale_text: «¿Conoce a Kunrad Voigtvir? No sé ni si seguirá vivo, pero en su época era el maestro de susurros de Theodora. En un principio, él quería destapar que yo era una espía, pero al final acabé convenciéndolo de que yo era su única oportunidad de frustrar una conjura muy suculenta y demostrarle a su mamaíta que iba a ser un heredero estupendo. No mentían cuando decían que no tenía muchas luces».

languages.text: “你认识昆拉德·维特威尔吗？我不知道他是不是还活着，但那个时候，他是西奥多拉的低语之主。按理说，他本该发现我那些手下的真实身份，但他却没这么做，他觉得这是个实施绝妙计划的好机会，向他妈妈证明他可以成为多么伟大的继承人。难怪大家都说金发出白痴。”
languages.original_text: "Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should have been the one to out my operatives as spies. But instead, he thought that they were his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mummy how great an heir he would become. It's true what they say about blonds — every other one is as thick as mince."

traits.locale_text: “你认识昆拉德·维特威尔吗？我不知道他是不是还活着，但那个时候，他是西奥多拉的低语之主。按理说，他本该拆穿我的间谍身份，但到了最后，我说服了他。我说，我可以帮助他完成绝妙的阴谋，向他妈妈证明他会成为多么伟大的继承人。难怪大家都说，发型难看的人，脑子一般也不太好使。”

languages.text: 「クンラッド・ボイトヴィルを知っているか？まだ生きているかはわからないが、当時、彼はシオドーラの囁きの主だった。普通に考えれば、私がスパイであることを暴くのは彼だったはずだ。だがそうはならなかった。あいつはそれを、見事な陰謀を企て、自分がどれだけ偉大な後継者になるかをママに証明するチャンスだと思ってたんだ。金髪がマヌケばかりというのは、どうやら本当だな」
languages.original_text: "Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should have been the one to out my operatives as spies. But instead, he thought that they were his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mummy how great an heir he would become. It's true what they say about blonds — every other one is as thick as mince."

traits.locale_text: 「クンラッド・ボイトヴィルを知っているか？まだ生きているかはわからないが、当時、彼はシオドーラの囁きの主だった。普通に考えれば、私がスパイであることを暴くのは彼だったはずだ。だがそうはならなかった。あいつはそれを、見事な陰謀を企て、自分がどれだけ偉大な後継者になるかをママに証明するチャンスだと思ってたんだ。金髪がマヌケばかりというのは、どうやら本当だな」

languages.text: "Kennt Ihr Kunrad Voigtvir? Ich weiß nicht, ob er noch lebt, doch damals war er Theodoras Meister des Geflüsters. Theoretisch hätte er meine Agenten als Spione enttarnen müssen. Stattdessen sah er in ihnen seine Chance, einen genialen Plan umzusetzen und seiner Mama zu beweisen, was er für einen großartigen Erben abgeben würde. Es stimmt, was man über blonde Leute sagt. Jeder zweite ist dumm wie Hackfleisch."
languages.original_text: "Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should have been the one to out my operatives as spies. But instead, he thought that they were his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mummy how great an heir he would become. It's true what they say about blonds — every other one is as thick as mince."

traits.locale_text: "Kennt Ihr Kunrad Voigtvir? Ich weiß nicht, ob er noch lebt, doch damals war er Theodoras Meister des Geflüsters. Theoretisch hätte er mich als Spion enttarnen müssen. Stattdessen habe ich ihn überzeugt, dass ich seine Chance war, einen genialen Plan umzusetzen und seiner Mama zu beweisen, was er für einen großartigen Erben abgeben würde. Es stimmt, was man sagt: Jeder zweite Hellkopf ist ein Vollarsch."

languages.text: "Kunrad Voigtvir'i tanıyor musun? Hâlâ yaşıyor mu bilmiyorum ama o zamanlar Theodora'nın Fısıltı Üstadı'ydı. Aslında adamlarımın ajan olduğunu ortaya çıkaran kişi o olmalıydı. Fakat o, adamlarımı harika bir kumpasa alet edebileceğini ve anneciğine ne kadar da iyi bir vâris olabileceğini kanıtlamak istedi. Sarışınlar aptal olurmuş derlerdi de inanmazdım."
languages.original_text: "Do you know Kunrad Voigtvir? Not sure if he's still alive, but back then, he was Theodora's Master of Whispers. In theory, he should have been the one to out my operatives as spies. But instead, he thought that they were his chance to pull off a brilliant plot and prove to his mummy how great an heir he would become. It's true what they say about blonds — every other one is as thick as mince."
